products.name: Pizza Mixic
products.description: Quarter pizza with ham, chicken, tomatoes, feta cheese, mozzarella, signature alfredo sauce

products.name: Pizza Julien
products.description: Chicken, champignons, creamy mushroom sauce, red onion, garlic, mozzarella, cheddar and parmesan cheese mixture, signature alfredo sauce

products.name: Pepperoni fresh
products.description: Spicy pepperoni, increased portion of mozzarella, tomatoes, signature tomato sauce
